data_model_understanding.conversation_reference: Initial context memory system setup discussion
data_model_understanding.note: Initial population - needs expansion with detailed model analysis

item.content: Items are catalog entries with rich metadata - core entity of the archive system

collaborator.content: Collaborators are people involved in creating or contributing to archived materials

collection.content: Collections are organized groupings of related materials

languoid.content: Languages with dialect information for linguistic heritage documentation

document_file.content: Documents/Files are the actual digital assets associated with Items
document_file.evolution_note: File model appears to be replacing Document model

access_control.content: Multi-level access control system (1-4) implemented across Items and Documents
access_control.implementation: Access level fields on relevant models

cultural_sensitivity.content: Anonymous flag on Collaborators indicates cultural sensitivity considerations
cultural_sensitivity.rationale: Some contributors need anonymity for cultural or personal reasons
cultural_sensitivity.implementation_impact: Special handling in queries, display, and access control

collaborator_service.content: CollaboratorService centralizes business logic for collaborator operations
collaborator_service.pattern: Service layer separates business logic from views and tasks

detailed_model_analysis.note: Comprehensive model field analysis and relationship mapping to be conducted during audit phase
